akn:content.akn:p: (b) There are authorized to be appropriated to carry out section 5309 of this title and section 3005(b) of the Federal Public Transportation Act of 2015 (49 U.S.C. 5309 note; Public Law 114–94), $3,000,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2022 through 2026.
(e) Amounts made available by or appropriated under this section shall remain available until expended.
